docs.title: Welcome to NxAdmin Documentation
docs.text: Welcome to the official documentation for NxAdmin — your next-generation, open-source web-based admin panel for games and experiences.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: NxAdmin is designed to be easy to install, configure, and extend.

docs.title: Key Features
docs.text:
• Web-based admin panel accessible from any browser
  • Built with modern technologies for fast, reliable control
  • Open-source and community-driven

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
To get NxAdmin running:

  1. Clone the repository: bash git clone https://github.com/NxAdmin/nxadmin.git
